name: Take the wheel!
description:
Take the wheel!

Being a wanted criminal in a car chase isn't easy, especially if you only have one arm. It does make shooting and driving at the same time quite difficult. But that shouldn't stop you!

Controls
A / D - Steer left / right
W - Accelerate
S - Break / drive backwards
Space - Switch between steering / shooting
Left Click - Shoot
F - Fullscreen
